lesson_html:
• Hello! - A common way to greet someone.
  • How are you? - A friendly way to ask about someone's well-being.
  • Good morning/afternoon/evening! - Time-specific greetings to show politeness.
  • Nice to meet you! - Used when meeting someone for the first time.
  • Goodbye! - A polite way to say farewell.

items.en: What time do you usually wake up?
items.explanation_en: This question asks about a common daily activity.
This question refers to a past event related to leisure.

items.en: Are you ready for the meeting?
items.explanation_en: This question checks someone's preparedness for a work-related event.

items.en: What did you have for breakfast?
items.explanation_en: This question inquires about a meal from the morning.

items.en: Will you join us for dinner?
items.explanation_en: This question invites someone to a meal in the future.
This question asks about someone's current emotional state.

items.en: What are your plans for the weekend?
items.target: ¿Cuáles son tus planes para el fin de semana?
items.explanation_en: This question inquires about someone's upcoming activities.

items.en: Did you see that movie last week?
items.explanation_en: This question refers to a past event related to entertainment.

items.en: Are you going to the party tomorrow?
items.explanation_en: This question asks about someone's attendance at a future event.

items.en: How was your day at work?
items.target: ¿Cómo fue tu día en el trabajo?
items.explanation_en: This question inquires about someone's workday experience.
